item.title: Simple command(client sided)
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

Nvm i figured it out, really easy lol

if(inputString.equals("::damage")) {
    if (newDamage == true)
        newDamage = false;
    else
        newDamage = true;}
